text: Jeddah Street Circuit (Arabic: حلبة شارع جدة) is a racing track in the Jeddah city. The track is to held in the inaugural Formula One Saudi Arabian Grand Prix as the penultimate race on the season calendar. It will be the second longest track on the Formula One calendar (only Spa-Francorchamps is longer). The track was designed by Hermann Tilke. == References == Category:Sport in Saudi Arabia Category:Formula One circuits
title: Jeddah Corniche Circuit
